
# Data tables

This is a data table from a csv file:

```{python}
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
from IPython.display import display, Markdown, HTML
import pandas as pd
import os.path
import glob

file_name = '../data/data_table.csv'

display(Markdown(pd.read_csv(file_name).to_markdown(index=False)))
display(HTML("<br><br>"))
```
